name: Star Skip
description:
Freely explore wide open space! The more you explore, the more upgrades your ship receives.

Hunt down pirates by searching for red dots on your map. Destroy them to obtain new weapons.

Pick up warp tokens to jump to warp speed and uncover huge segments of the map in just seconds!

Upgrades occur automatically as your ship explores more and more space. Use the upgrade bar at the bottom of your screen to select which weapon will receive automatic power boosts.

-Controls-

-Gamepad-
Rotate: right stick
Forward/Backwards: left stick
Fire Main Weapon: RT
Fire Super Laser: LT
Lay Mine: RB
Fire Missile: LB
Toggle between Main Weapon and Pierce Shot : B
Warp Jump: Y
Select weapon to upgrade: D-pad left/D-pad right:
Check map: Back

-Keyboard-
Rotate: A/D
Forward/Backwards: W/S
Fire Main Weapon: Space/Mouse Left
Fire Super Laser: X/Mouse Right
Lay Mine: left alt
Fire Missile: left shift
Toggle between Main Weapon and Pierce Shot: left ctrl
Warp Jump: J
Select weapon to upgrade: Z/C
Check map: M

Code: tfaris, rarida

Music: tfaris

Artwork: rarida
